rukus.text: And those who denied Our signs, We will draw them on gradually from where they will not know
And I will grant them indulgence for a while. Truly, My strategizing is sure
Reflect they not? There is no madness in their companion. He is but a clear warner
Expect they not in the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and whatever things God created that perhaps their term be near? Then, in which discourse after this will they believe
Whomever God causes to go astray then, there is no one who guides him. And He forsakes them in their defiance, wandering unwilling to see

They ask thee about the Hour, when will it berth? Say: The knowledge of that is only with my Lord. None will display its time but He. It was heavy, hidden in the heavens and the earth. It will approach you not but suddenly. They will ask thee as if thou hadst been one who is well-informed about it. Say: The knowledge of that is only with God, but most of humanity knows not

Say: I rule not over myself either for profit or for hurt, but what God willed. And if the unseen had been known to me, I would have acquired much good and evil would not have afflicted me. I am but a warner and a bearer of good tidings to a folk who believe
